original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-13 20:12:15' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 01:51:15' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.BountyAmount<=50 AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=12 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 19:09:39' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-13 20:12:15'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount <= 50 AND votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:00:00'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 01:51:15'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 12 AND users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 19:09:39'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3E2.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2E4.UserId)
